nodes.text: The Gyndine shipyards were shipyards located at the administrative world of Gyndine. According to a report from a mole in the Pyke Syndicate that made its way to New Republic Intelligence Agent Caern Adan around 5 ABY, a damaged Imperial Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier had arrived at the shipyards seeking assistance. Adan reviewed the report with his colleague Yrica Quell, the pair searching for leads on the activity of the Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. Quell, believing the source was reliable but feeling that the information was insufficient, marking it with a medium-confidence indicator.
The Gyndine shipyards were mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
